text: Valley Grande is a city in Dallas County, Alabama, United States, just north of Selma. Incorporated in early 2003, Valley Grande is governed by a mayor- council form of government.About Valley Grande, City of Valley Grande, 2008. Accessed 2008-03-08. ==References== Category:Cities in Alabama Category:2003 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Alabama
title: Valley Grande, Alabama
